title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 303.1 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 303.1 - General

State Regulations

On or prior to the 60th day after the end of each fiscal
year, each mutual savings bank and mutual savings and loan association shall
prepare a complete statement of its financial condition and of its income and
expense as of the end of such year, in conformity with generally accepted
accounting principles. The statements may also include such additional
information as the institution may wish to provide its
depositors. Notes
